name: Lenny Rachitsky
title: Newsletter Guy
archetypeDescription: Turned 'I got laid off from Airbnb' into a media empire by asking other PMs about their frameworks

moves.name: Benchmark Blast
moves.effect: Makes opponent feel inadequate about their metrics

flavor: Interviewed every PM who ever shipped anything, synthesized it into frameworks, and now every PM sounds exactly the same. You're welcome.
bangerQuote: Made more money asking 'what metrics do you track?' than most PMs make actually tracking metrics.
roastBullets: Became the most influential PM by... not being a PM anymore
Has asked 'what's your framework for X' so many times it's now his actual personality
The only person who can make 'I aggregate other people's insights' sound like thought leadership
Proof that the best career move in product is to stop doing product and just talk about it
